mutants.original_line: return '<%d: value %d%s>' % (self.id, self.value, ' LINKED: ' + ','.join([str(a.id) for a in self.adjacent]) if self.adjacent else '')
mutants.mutated_line: return '<%d: value %d%s>' * (self.id, self.value, ' LINKED: ' + ','.join([str(a.id) for a in self.adjacent]) if self.adjacent else '')

mutants.original_line: return '<%d: value %d%s>' % (self.id, self.value, ' LINKED: ' + ','.join([str(a.id) for a in self.adjacent]) if self.adjacent else '')
mutants.mutated_line: return '<%d: value %d%s>' + (self.id, self.value, ' LINKED: ' + ','.join([str(a.id) for a in self.adjacent]) if self.adjacent else '')

mutants.original_line: incl = self.bestfor(value + v.value, fringe.union(adj, *[a.adjacent for a in adj]).difference(incl_vis), incl_vis)
mutants.mutated_line: incl = self.bestfor(value - v.value, fringe.union(adj, *[a.adjacent for a in adj]).difference(incl_vis), incl_vis)

mutants.original_line: incl = self.bestfor(value + v.value, fringe.union(adj, *[a.adjacent for a in adj]).difference(incl_vis), incl_vis)
mutants.mutated_line: incl = self.bestfor(value * v.value, fringe.union(adj, *[a.adjacent for a in adj]).difference(incl_vis), incl_vis)

mutants.original_line: return '<%d: value %d%s>' % (self.id, self.value, ' LINKED: ' + ','.join([str(a.id) for a in self.adjacent]) if self.adjacent else '')
mutants.mutated_line: return '' % (self.id, self.value, ' LINKED: ' + ','.join([str(a.id) for a in self.adjacent]) if self.adjacent else '')

mutants.original_line: adj = {a for a in v.adjacent if a not in visited}
mutants.mutated_line: adj = {a for a in v.adjacent if a in visited}

mutants.original_line: return '<%d: value %d%s>' % (self.id, self.value, ' LINKED: ' + ','.join([str(a.id) for a in self.adjacent]) if self.adjacent else '')
mutants.mutated_line: return '<%d: value %d%s>' % (self.id, self.value, ' LINKED: ' - ','.join([str(a.id) for a in self.adjacent]) if self.adjacent else '')

mutants.original_line: return '<%d: value %d%s>' % (self.id, self.value, ' LINKED: ' + ','.join([str(a.id) for a in self.adjacent]) if self.adjacent else '')
mutants.mutated_line: return '<%d: value %d%s>' % (self.id, self.value, ' LINKED: ' * ','.join([str(a.id) for a in self.adjacent]) if self.adjacent else '')

mutants.original_line: return '<%d: value %d%s>' % (self.id, self.value, ' LINKED: ' + ','.join([str(a.id) for a in self.adjacent]) if self.adjacent else '')
mutants.mutated_line: return '<%d: value %d%s>' % (self.id, self.value, ' LINKED: ' + ','.join([str(a.id) for a in self.adjacent]) if self.adjacent else 'MUTATED')

mutants.original_line: return '<%d: value %d%s>' % (self.id, self.value, ' LINKED: ' + ','.join([str(a.id) for a in self.adjacent]) if self.adjacent else '')
mutants.mutated_line: return '<%d: value %d%s>' % (self.id, self.value, '' + ','.join([str(a.id) for a in self.adjacent]) if self.adjacent else '')

mutants.original_line: return '<%d: value %d%s>' % (self.id, self.value, ' LINKED: ' + ','.join([str(a.id) for a in self.adjacent]) if self.adjacent else '')
mutants.mutated_line: return '<%d: value %d%s>' % (self.id, self.value, ' LINKED: ' + ''.join([str(a.id) for a in self.adjacent]) if self.adjacent else '')
